title: Deep within and all around, as innocent eyes look up and glance down below, whilst swimming within the...

attachments.displayName:
Deep within and all around, as innocent eyes look up and glance down below, whilst swimming within the circle of eternal bliss... For there are really angles that define the infinite layers of eternity... All angles of perception and all hues of dedication... To feel the muse by knowing that there's nothing to lose... but merely everything to gain, even when starting all over again... Looking deep within, whilst manifesting outwardly... Magically and Mystically... Serendipity of the fates brings brilliance and serenity in a serenade of a charming union! A Universal Divine Unification-Thyself in Unification with the Divine Union! Divine in Light, Divine in Darkness and lovers from both angles of "Being"! Both Angles of Heaven are delightful lovers of the "Universal Haven" for all of eternity! A starlit remembrance to shine for all of eternity! Moon Bliss and a Starlit Kiss to seal the deal between this union!

Upon looking deep into the midst of enchantment, and discovering the Ecliptic Quasi Fashion of Being! Whilst the process of intermingling in union with the Midst of the Universal Starlit Mirror so Angular! The ripple effects shall give the deep desire to swim through the Ocean Waves of such an angular shape shifting union, between thyself and all that is! A glorious elemental freedom with nature so innocently, so lovingly...

Upon Hallow's Nigh' ... The spook entertains the Universal Truth's Nook!

My Poetic Expression of Hallow's Nigh'  <3>><3<<
Nevertheless, have a safe and spooky night!

Deep within and all around, as innocent eyes look up and glance down below, whilst swimming within the circle of eternal bliss... For there are really angles that define the infinite layers of eternity... All angles of perception and all hues of dedication... To feel the muse by knowing that there's nothing to lose... but merely everything to gain, even when starting all over again... Looking deep within, whilst manifesting outwardly... Magically and Mystically... Serendipity of the fates brings brilliance and serenity in a serenade of a charming union! A Universal Divine Unification-Thyself in Unification with the Divine Union! Divine in Light, Divine in Darkness and lovers from both angles of "Being"! Both Angles of Heaven are delightful lovers of the "Universal Haven" for all of eternity! A starlit remembrance to shine for all of eternity! Moon Bliss and a Starlit Kiss to seal the deal between this union!

Upon looking deep into the midst of enchantment, and discovering the Ecliptic Quasi Fashion of Being! Whilst the process of intermingling in union with the Midst of the Universal Starlit Mirror so Angular! The ripple effects shall give the deep desire to swim through the Ocean Waves of such an angular shape shifting union, between thyself and all that is! A glorious elemental freedom with nature so innocently, so lovingly... 

Upon Hallow's Nigh' ... The spook entertains the Universal Truth's Nook!

Nevertheless, have a safe and spooky night!
